description:
Aventura offers a Teacher Planning Day (TPD) program, winter camp, spring camp and the 8-week summer camp program, offering homework assistance and tutoring.

Summer Camp 2016:
Will be held June 13 - August 19 

Summer Camp:
(June 13-August 19) - 9 Weeks 
Campers experience supervised interactive activities such as arts & crafts, games, sports, special events, field trips, and swimming appropriate for their age group.

Travel Camp: 
(June 13-August 12) - 8 Weeks
Campers experience field trips to local attractions, community parks, swimming, games, arts and crafts, and special events.

Sports Camp: 
(June 13-August 12) - 8 Weeks
Campers prepare to be exceptional both on and off the field and choose the sport they wish to participate in including: soccer, basketball, volleyball, cheerleading, or dance.
name: AVENTURA SUMMER CAMPS
